title.narrative: Life-saving nutritional support for the most vulnerable children and women in the drought-affected counties in North and South Hwanghae and South Pyongan

description.narrative: The objective of WFP's project is to prevent the deterioration in the nutritional status of children under-five and pregnant and lactating women who are food insecure and vulnerable to undernutrition, by providing fortified supplementary foods as a life-saving intervention for four months. With CERF funds, WFP will provide fortified cereals and biscuits during a four-month period to a total of 186,012 beneficiaries, including 141,277 children under-five and 44,785 pregnant and lactating women, in 23 drought-affected counties in North and South Hwanghae and South Pyongan provinces.
